full on middle, defended
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full outside off, pushed to mid-off and they scamper a single, helped by the fumble
length outside off, steered to third-man
length, cramping him up, defended to squareleg
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length on middle, charges down the wicket and drags it along the ground to deep midwicket
length outside off, steered to third-man and Sabbir brings up his fifty and it's been an excellent one. Decisive in both defence an attack, he has given his more celebrated teammates a tutorial
length outside off, defended to cover
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushed to deep point
tossed up outside off, pushed to point
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full outside off, pushed to long-off
length onto the pads, tucked away to deep square-leg's left for two
full on the pads, clipped between deep squareleg and deep midwicket for two. Had to stretch there at the striker's end as the throw from the deep was right over the bails

items.preText: Mark Row: "With no disrespect to Bangladesh, I wonder about the value of this series in terms of answering selection questions for NZ for the World Cup. Some players like Boult and Taylor have been pretty consistent through the season. Others consistently underperformed against India but are putting in some good performances against BD. They may get the nod for the squad but one is left with the uncomfortable feeling that they will underperform when it matters at the WC. "
items.text: full outside off, squeezed past point and down to third-man for a run
full on off, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length, angled across, the batsman flashes and misses

items.text: length on middle, defended to cover
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushed to point's left for one
short ball, well directed, followed the batsman, made a terrible sound as it crashed into the grille off the helmet
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 leg bye

items.preText: So - what are Bangladesh looking to achieve in the last 19 overs?

length ball on off, and he stays on the back foot to defend
